240.question: What was the performance of both approaches on their dataset?
240.response: {'Answer': 'The EER(%) results of the i-vector and x-vector systems are shown in Table 4. These systems were trained on VoxCeleb and evaluated on three evaluation sets.'}
240.answer: ERR of 19.05 with i-vectors and 15.52 with x-vectors

245.question: By how much is performance on CN-Celeb inferior to performance on VoxCeleb?
245.response: {'Answer': 'The answer can be found by referring to Table 4 and Table 3 which detail the performance (EER Results) on VoxCeleb and the comparison between CN-Celeb and VoxCeleb, respectively.'}
245.answer: For i-vector system, performances are 11.75% inferior to voxceleb. For x-vector system, performances are 10.74% inferior to voxceleb
